articles.author: Manveena Suri, David McKenzie and Ivana Kottasová, CNN
articles.title: At least 14 dead in a mass shooting at a bar in Soweto, South Africa
articles.description: At least 14 people were killed and nine more injured in a shooting at a bar in the South African township of Soweto on Sunday, local authorities said.
articles.content: At least 14 people were killed and nine more injured in a shooting at a bar in the South African township of Soweto on Sunday, local authorities said.

articles.author: Samantha Beech and Christina Maxouris, CNN
articles.title: A massive blaze on Nantucket Island has damaged a historic hotel and several other buildings
articles.description: Massachusetts firefighters were battling a large blaze Saturday that was first reported at a hotel on Nantucket Island.
articles.content: Massachusetts firefighters were battling a large blaze Saturday that was first reported at a hotel on Nantucket Island.

articles.title: After Another Mass Shooting, Questions Loom About the Role of Parents
articles.description: Mothers and fathers of young men accused in shootings, including the 21-year-old charged in the massacre in Highland Park, Ill., have faced scrutiny.

articles.title: A 14-year-old is fatally stabbed at a train station in New York, authorities say
articles.description: Officers found the boy on a train platform with a stab wound to the abdomen, police said in a statement. Preliminary investigations indicate a fight began on the street and continued into the train station .
articles.content:
(CNN)A 14-year-old boy who was stabbed during a fight inside a subway station on Saturday has died, according to the New York Police Department.

articles.title: What we know about the man suspected of shooting Shinzo Abe
articles.description: Police in Japan have launched a murder investigation into the assassination of former Japanese prime minister Shinzo Abe -- but little is known about the suspect who was arrested at the scene of the fatal shooting on Friday.
